long_description: Crave Bait Gravy - This natural scent will increase the effectiveness of many of our lures...making them even more deadly. Best suited to our soft baits such as Superior Frog, Pro Frog and Vivif because the soft PVC bodies hold the scent longer than our metal lures. It's just another arrow in your quiver. 2oz. bottle.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
